enWisdom: Whoever seeks true guidance through the guidance of Allah is guided to the right path by Him

Wisdom: مَنِ اهْتَدَى بِهُدَى اللَّهِ فَارَقَ الْأَضْدَادَ
enWisdom: He who seeks true guidance through the guidance of Allah disassociates [himself] from the opponents [who oppose His command]
The guidance of Allah is the best guidance

Wisdom: لَمْ يُخْلِ اللَّهُ سُبْحَانَهُ عِبَادَهُ مِنْ حُجَّةٍ لَازِمَةٍ أَوْ مَحَجَّةٍ قَائِمَةٍ
enWisdom: Allah, the Glorified, never leaves His servants without a necessary proof or an established, clear path

Wisdom: لَمْ يُخْلِ اللَّهُ سُبْحَانَهُ عِبَادَهُ مِنْ نَبِيٍّ مُرْسَلٍ وَكِتَابٍ مُنْزَلٍ
enWisdom: Allah, the Glorified, never lets His servants remain without a divinely appointed Prophet or a revealed book [to guide them]

Wisdom: لَمْ يَخْلُقْكُمُ اللَّهُ سُبْحَانَهُ عَبَثاً وَلَمْ يَتْرُكْكُمْ سُدًى وَلَمْ يَدَعْكُمْ فِي ضَلَالَةٍ وَلَا عَمًى
enWisdom: Allah, the Glorified, has not created you in vain, and has not abandoned you to wander aimlessly, and He has not left you alone in misguidance and blindness

Wisdom: مَا كَانَ اللَّهُ سُبْحَانَهُ لِيُضِلَّ أَحَداً وَلَيْسَ اللَّهُ بِظَلَّامٍ لِلْعَبِيدِ
enWisdom: Allah, the Glorified, does not misguide anyone and Allah is not unjust to the servants
